transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh anya call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay paschat prayas karein. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh anya call par vyast
Hello.
Hello, good morning, Anish sir.
Yes, who is this?
Main Yashika bol rahi hu sir, aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Badhai madam, badhai.
So sir, main Sachita hamari aapne matlab woh hire kari hai kya employee?
Ji.
IndiaMART use karne ke liye?
Ha ji ha ji.
Okay, so unhone call kiya tha customer care pe like ki buyleads vagera kaise consume karni hai?
Ha ji ha ji ha ji.
To aap to matlab aapke paas mere number available nahi tha kya because aap to mujhe kyunki agar aap matlab vaise bhi coordinate karte hain kisi bhi
Mai mai number, mai aapka number deta hu actually mere ko na sahi batau, mere paas aapka number save nahi hai ji. Mai ek baar madam ko bhi deta hu.
To aap ha agar kabhi aisa issue ho na sir ki aapko number nahi mil raha apne account manager ka, to aapka jo IndiaMART ka application hai aapke phone mein, usme na expert assistant karke aapko option aata hai aur waha account manager ka number, email id sab rehta hai.
Actually maine na usme help mein na dala tha ki relationship manager ka number kya hai. To woh jo same number hai woh 9696969696 karke aaya.
Oh, yeh to customer care ka number hai sir, woh wala us pe call nahi karni hoti, aap mere number pe call kar sakte hain. Kyunki woh bhi mere paas hi aate hain.
Ha ha.
Mai madam ko bolta hu aap ek baar unse baat kare.
Ha to aap ya to mera number dijiye ya mujhe unka number dijiye mai kar leti hu. Actually abhi niche gayi hui hai woh product dekh rahi hai thode. Uske baad us special humne isi cheez ke liye hire kiye hain to woh yahi dekhenge, thik hai?
Thik hai, thik hai. To kitni der mein mai call back karu?
Bhabhi abhi 20 minute baad woh aapse baat kar lengi, mai aapka number forward kar raha hu.
Thik hai kar dijiye kyunki mai phir unko kara deti hu sari training vagera video call pe sab kuch kara deti hu.
Thik, okay.
Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not have executive's number.

- Enquired about Sachita and buyleads consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about expert assistant option.

- Executive offered to connect with Sachita.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will forward the number to Sachita.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, buyleads, expert assistant, follow up
